author: @Necroherz
text:
First of all there is one thing really important that left me really perplexed about this episode and was that when they were naming all the NCT subunit no one named WayV too and WTF like please don't make me start to feel really worried about the fact that the Visions were transferred to Prism Center i mean they're still part of NCT. Let's not forget that... 😨
Aside from that, i loved how Sion as the leader had to speak more since Riku and specially Yushi are really shy. Our Doyoung and Haechan were so kind and were one in the same goal of make the Wishies feel comfortable as well be sure that all of them could answer the questions and give their opinions and even they gave them all the time to them to speak their minds Riku and Yushi couldn't because i guess they were really nervous so the leader had take the lead a little 

Ps: One special highlight for me was, first, the fact that Sion laughs a lot and second it was really fun that part when they were giving gifts to each others and Haechan and Doyoung got the Wichu plushie who also had photocards and our bunny apparently got Sions one and he pointed out how cute and sassy he was biting the star toy hahaha Sion had to hide his face behind Riku 😅

author: @fridasayago2166
text:
Se me hace tan raro ver a Wish tan tranquilo y callado; cuando entre ellos son todo un caso.
Como Riku mira a Sion para que le de su aprobación al hablar el coreano o para tomar confianza de él. Riku y Yushi (todo Wish) siempre buscan a Sion, él es el apoyo de ellos, siempre lo andan buscando (para que les de confianza, apoyo, seguridad, etc) habla del buen liderazgo que lleva Sion y como busca que los miembros se sientan cómodos y agusto con lo que les rodea, siempre se preocupa por ellos. Aunque sea tímido y tranquilo tiene una presencia fuerte, en tan poco tiempo esta siendo un buen ejemplo de liderazgo.
Doyo siempre amable y atento con ellos y todos. Hae creo tiene un flechazo con Yushi, me encanta que tengan mucho en común y como muestra su lado hyung.
NCT hyung's ahora podrán sacar su lado hyung (tienen a sus donsaengs) pero no lo muestran tanto con algunos y ahora, con Wish podrán mostrarnos otro lado de ellos.
Espero ver más contenido con todo NCT.

author: @YJJUKYUKYUIK
text:
DAFOH: Undeniable Evidence

Deborah Collins-Perrica, Director of DAFOH’s Nursing Affairs, spoke at the event.

Deborah Collins-Perrica is the Director of Nursing Affairs for DAFOH. She said it is a hideous crime to forcibly extract organs from innocent people without consent, but such a practice was approved and supported by the Chinese Communist Party (CCP). With assistance from the police and the military, a lucrative organ transplant supply chain has been developed in China. 

One major group of victims of the forced organ harvesting is practitioners of Falun Gong, a meditation system popular in China due to its mind and body benefits. There were about 100 million practitioners in China before the CCP began to persecute the group in July 1999. Since then, a large number of Falun Gong practitioners have been detained, tortured, and have even become victims of forced organ harvesting. 

“The victims followed such a secretive path. The victims who are exploited, abused, and prepared for organ harvesting undergo medical testing while in political detention. This created an organ on demand system that can deliver fast-track transplant organs within days of notice,” Ms. Collins-Perrica explained. “Victims who are force labored, neglected and tortured are medically examined, undergo chest X-rays, ultrasound, and blood tests in prison hospitals and detention centers. This discrepancy in treatment is unprecedented.”

According to a report from China Daily in 2016, China put a price tag of US $46,000 for a kidney transplant, $90,000 for a liver transplant, and $150,000 for a heart transplant. Collins-Perrica said that organ transplants are among the most profitable industries, with an annual revenue of about one billion USD.

author: @공지-d8q
text:
해찬이 메보인데도 춤으로도 매번 칭찬받는거 너무 멋있음 
이번 영상에선 리쿠가 해찬이 직캠 종종 봤다 했구 
시온이 스엠와서 간 첫 콘서트에서 멋있게 턴하고 무대하는 해찬이 인상깊었다했구
료 춤 롤모델 해찬이라구 했구
재희 엔시티유 해찬이랑 하고 싶다했고
쇼타로 엔시티 들어와서 춤으로 놀란멤버 태용해찬
지성 춤으로 5명 그룹 만들면 우선은 해찬이형 넣는다고 했고
그룹 안무디렉터 댄서분이랑 멤버들이 뽑은 제일 춤 빨리 따고 기억 잘하는 멤버 해찬이
연습생들 많이 가르치는 댄서분이 해찬이 춤 칭찬하면서 직접 푼 썰에서 연생들이 해찬이 춤선 분석 많이 하고 해찬이처럼 추고싶다고 하는 사람들 많다고 한거 진짜 뿌듯

author: @papaybani9440
text:
What is this heartwarming feeling inside? It's just nice to see the hyungs and the maknaes interact. I love how Haechan and Doyoung made them feel comfortable and laugh so much. Haechan and Doyoung have that innate skill to make people around them feel comfortable. And it turns out it's not just the NCTzens and the NCT hyungs who find them cute, but also the people from Neo production. Everyone finds them cute. Also, it's not just Sions's wish, but also us NCTzens' wish to have another NCT field day content.

Finally, people say that Haechan finally felt like a real brother since Chenji felt more like same-age friends, but I like to think that's only on camera. I think it's more accurate to say that Haechan finally shows his "hyung side" MORE ON CAMERA since Haechan also knows the ropes in entertainment shows imo. Just my two cents

author: @hannapig8494
text:
🥹 This video gives a mixture of emotions. This reminds me of NCT rookie days, and here we are, NCT, giving advice to NCT. I did know this time would come when I became a fan of NCT, but I never thought of how it would feel because Wayv felt like they've been always part of the fam cause I've known win,ten, and kun even before wayV that's but this time they're all new, it feels different. But,  I can't wish for more but our Ilichils,  Dreamies, Wayvies , and wishes, happiness and good health.  

I wonder what it would be after years, but I will definitely come back to this video. 

P.S. welcome to the family our wishes🎉💚

author: @jh8399
text:
아 김도영 진짜 왜이렇게 다정해,,? 애기들 연습생때 힘내라고 피자 사줌(그것도 여러번), 위시 팀 결성했다고 고기 사줌, 데뷔했다고 음방 직접 찾아가서 애기들 최애음료 공차랑 간식 사서 응원해줌, 엄청 바쁜 와중에 위시애기들 자컨도 챙겨봄, 애기들 다같이 사니까 함께 들으라고 좋은 스피커 사줌, 편지까지 써줌(그것도 평소에 해주고 싶은 말 꾹꾹 눌러담았대..) 하,, 이쯤에서 최강도프 료깅이 인터뷰 봐야됨
료: 도영 선배님은 활동한지 오래됐음에도 불구하고 주변 사람들을 잘 챙겨주시고 팬분들께 감사해하는 마음이 예쁘다고 생각했어요. 그래서 저도 아티스트가 되면 그렇게 되고 싶다고 생각하면서 최대한 닮아보려고 노력하고 있어요.
